channel.title: Posts on The Etherington Group
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Etherington Group

item.title: New Module
item.description: We have developed a new module on Quantum and Molecular Photophysics for the 3rd Year students. This is a research-led module and will give the students good opprtunity to learn about OLEDs.

item.title: New Website
item.description: Welcome to the new website of the Etherington Group. Please feel free to explore and have a look around!
